Texas Best Sprinklers, Drainage and Lighting

Professional Irrigation Services

Expert sprinkler system solutions for Fort Worth and Weatherford properties

Get a Free QuoteExplore Services

Our Comprehensive Services

Texas Best Sprinklers offers a complete range of irrigation services to meet the needs of residential and commercial property owners throughout Fort Worth and Weatherford.

Sprinkler System Installation

Custom-designed irrigation systems for new construction or landscape renovations, professionally installed for optimal coverage and water efficiency.

Learn More about Sprinkler System Installation

Sprinkler Repair & Maintenance

Comprehensive repair services for all types of sprinkler systems, from fixing broken heads and leaking pipes to full system troubleshooting.

Learn More about Sprinkler Repair & Maintenance

Drainage Solutions

Expert design and installation of yard drainage systems to prevent water accumulation, protect your landscape, and prevent foundation damage.

Learn More about Drainage Solutions

Smart Irrigation Controls

Upgrade your system with weather-based, Wi-Fi enabled controllers that automatically adjust watering schedules based on local conditions.

Learn More about Smart Irrigation Controls

Drip Irrigation

Water-efficient drip systems for gardens, flower beds, and container plants that deliver moisture directly to plant roots with minimal waste.

Learn More about Drip Irrigation

Commercial Irrigation

Specialized irrigation solutions for commercial properties, HOAs, municipal parks, and sports fields, focusing on water conservation and coverage.

Learn More about Commercial Irrigation

Why Choose Texas Best Sprinklers?

Licensed & Insured Professionals

Our team includes licensed irrigation professionals with extensive training and expertise in all aspects of sprinkler system design, installation, and repair.

Quality Parts & Materials

We use only professional-grade equipment and components from trusted manufacturers, ensuring your system is built to last with minimal maintenance.

Water Conservation Focus

All our irrigation solutions are designed with water efficiency in mind, helping you maintain a beautiful landscape while minimizing water usage and costs.

Warranty & Service Guarantee

We stand behind our work with comprehensive warranties on installations and a satisfaction guarantee on all repairs and services.

Our Service Areas

We proudly provide irrigation services to residential and commercial properties throughout Tarrant and Parker counties.

Fort Worth

Serving all areas of Fort Worth including Arlington Heights, TCU, Tanglewood, Westover Hills, Ridglea, Wedgwood, and surrounding neighborhoods.

Fort Worth Services

Weatherford

Serving Weatherford, Hudson Oaks, Willow Park, Aledo, Brock, and other communities throughout Parker County.

Weatherford Services

Contact us today for a free consultation and estimate on any of our services.
